text.section:
A claim for refund under subsection (a) of this section shall be as required by:
regulations adopted by the Comptroller, for a claim under § 14-904 of this subtitle;
regulations adopted by the governing body of the county or of the municipal corporation, for a claim made under § 14-905(a), (b), or (d) of this subtitle; or
the Comptroller or the chief fiscal officer of the county, for a claim under § 14-907 or § 14-908 of this subtitle.
